title: Altered Ego Fonts Gear now available
content:
T-shirts, hats, and other wearables, and lifestyle gear featuring designs from the Altered Ego Fonts library are available at [http://www.cafeshops.com/alteredegofonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014170022/http:/www.cafeshops.com/alteredegofonts).   
   
Popular items include the Eclectic Clock, the Fishbone shirt and items featuring icons from AEF American Spirit.   
   
All items come with a 30-day money-back guarantee from the manufacturer.   
   
New designs are continually added.   
   
Altered Ego Fonts are designed to solve visual and typographic problems for print and interactive media, and feature dingbat, condensed and narrow-width fonts.
author: briansooy
